DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.mqttSetup|block: MQTT設置|IOT_ID(用戶): %IOT_ID| IOT_PWD(密碼) :%IOT_PWD| Topic(默認topic_0): %IOT_TOPIC|服務器:%SERVERS||IP(SIOT):%IP
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.WIFISetup|block: WiFi 初始設置 | 引腳設置: | 接收數據(綠色接線): %receive| 發送數據(藍色接線): %send | Wi-Fi: | 名稱: %SSID| 密碼: %PASSWORD 啟動連接
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.mqttCallbackUser|bloc: 在 topic_0 收到消息时运行
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.httpPost|block: http(post) | url %url| content %content| 超時(毫秒) %time
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.httpPut|block: http(put) | url %url| content %content| 超時(毫秒) %time
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.ThingSpeakSend|block: ThingSpeak 發送 值1: %field1||值2: %field2|值3: %field3|值4: %field4|值5: %field5|值6: %field6|值7: %field7 值8: %field8
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.IFTTTSend|block: IFTTT 發送 值1 %value1| 值2 %value2| 值3 %value3
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.httpSetup|block: 設置 http | ip: %IP 開始連接
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.IFTTTConfigure|block: IFTTT 配置事件: %EVENT 密钥: %KEY
DFRobotWiFiIoTUART.sendmessage|block: BeeBotte 頻道: %channel 資源: %resource 發送數據 %data
